views.ui_expr:
rule!AS_GSS_CPS_viewFactors(
  evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
  loggedInUser: loggedInUser()
)

rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationRatingsTab(
  evaluationId:rv!identifier ,
  evaluationFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "is null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationSubFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "not null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  )
)

rule!AS_GSS_CPS_consensusReportView(

)

rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId])

rule!AS_GSS_FM_evaluationAuditHistory(
  evaluation: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation(
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  evaluationPhases: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationPhases(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationCriterias: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluatorTeams: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluatorTeam(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationDocs:rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationDocuments(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    fetchAll: true()
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_dropdownField
interfaces.description:
Generic single select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField
interfaces.description:
Generic multi select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValues: joinarray(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!value,
    expression: displayvalue(fv!item, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null)
  ), ", "),
  local!i18nData:rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleNames: "AS.CO.CommonObjects"
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValues,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              i18nData: local!i18nData,
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      required: ri!required,
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pickerFieldRecords"(
  label: ri!label,

interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_dateField
interfaces.description: Standard wrapper for a!dateField()

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(
      date: ri!value
    ),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align,
    showHyphenIfValueNull :ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_paragraphField
interfaces.description: Standard wrapper for a!paragraphField()

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

      readOnly: false

    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/

    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,

interfaces.description: Interface to display the rating description and rating documents

test_inputs.input_value:
'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria'(

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationInformationForLeftPanelOfSummary
interfaces.description: Evaluation details to be shown on left side of the summary

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!vendorCount: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCount],
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: true()
  ),
  local!vendorPagingInfo: a!refreshVariable(
    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_VENDOR_INFO_IN_SUMMARY_PAGE,
      sort: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pendingUpdateCount,
          ascending: false()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.decisionTypeId,
          ascending: true()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sortableTotalPriceValue,
          ascending: true()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate,
          ascending: false
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
          ascending: true()
        )
      }
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: local!vendorCount
  ),
  local!subfactorTasksTriggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!factorSelectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!factorTasksTriggerRefresh
  ),
  local!subfactorSelectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!subfactorTasksTriggerRefresh
  ),
  local!vendorInfo: rule!AS_GSS_formatVendorInfoForCards(
    evaluationRecord: ri!evaluationRecord,
    pagingInfo: local!vendorPagingInfo
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
    contents: {
      /*Details*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationDetailsForSummary(
        i18nData: ri!i18nData,
        evaluationRecord: ri!evaluationRecord
      ),
      /*Vendors*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorsInfoForEvaluationSummary(
        i18nData: ri!i18nData,
        pagingInfo: local!vendorPagingInfo,
        vendorInfo: local!vendorInfo,
        isSetUpPending: contains(
          {
            cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
            cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP
          },
          ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId]
        ),
        evaluation: ri!evaluationRecord,
        factorCount: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.factorCount],
        isStateOrLocal: ri!isStateOrLocal
      ),
      /*factor details*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationFactorDetailsForSummary(
        i18nData: ri!i18nData,
        evaluation: ri!evaluationRecord,
        expandFactor: ri!expandFactor,
        selectedFactor: ri!selectedFactor,
        selectedSubfactor: ri!selectedSubfactor,
        selectedFactorIndex: ri!selectedFactorIndex,
        factorSelectedTasks: local!factorSelectedTasks,
        subfactorSelectedTasks: local!subfactorSelectedTasks,
        factorTasksTriggerRefresh: ri!factorTasksTriggerRefresh,
        subfactorTasksTriggerRefresh: local!subfactorTasksTriggerRefresh,
        evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
        allFactors: ri!allFactors,
        loggedInUser: ri!loggedInUser,
        isSetUpPending: contains(
          {
            cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
            cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP
          },
          ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId]
        )
      ),
      /*Evaluation Approach*/
      rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_recordSummaryActiveTasks(
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        i18nData: ri!i18nData,
        selectedTasks: ri!selectedTasks,
        user: ri!loggedInUser,
        evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
        isEvaluator: ri!isEvaluator,
        isHomePage: ri!isHomePage
      )
    }
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!sourceApplicationId,
  whenTrue: and(
    fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GCW,
    rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_APPVERSION_UT_VersionTrackerWrapper_exists()
  ),
  then: a!localVariables(
    local!getSolicDetails: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_GETDATA_getLatestOrBaseSolicitationDetails(
      evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
      isBaseSolic: false()
    ),
    local!solicitationId: index(
      local!getSolicDetails,
      "solicitationId",
      null
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_SCT_evaluationSummarySectionField(
      label: "Solicitation",
      contents: if(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(local!solicitationId),
        /* null state */
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_emptyState(
          cardType: "ins_NoRelatedProcurementsAvailable",
          i18nData: ri!i18nData
        ),
        /* means this record was created from solicitation in GCW */
        rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_DISPLAY_relatedProcurementDetailsForEvalSummary(evaluationId: ri!evaluationId)
      ),
      hideCard: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!solicitationId),
      sectionMarginAbove: "STANDARD",
      cardShape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
      cardPadding: "STANDARD",
      showCardBorder: false,
      showCardShadow: true
    )
  ),
  whenTrue: and(
    fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_AM,
    rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_AM_APPVERSION_UT_VersionTrackerWrapper_exists()
  ),
  then: a!localVariables(
    local!getSolicDetailsFromAm: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_AM_GETDATA_getSolicitationDataForDraftingEvaluation(solicitationNumber: ri!evaluationNumber),
    local!solicitationNumber: index(
      local!getSolicDetailsFromAm,
      "solicitationNumber",
      null
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_SCT_evaluationSummarySectionField(
      label: "Solicitation",
      contents: if(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(local!solicitationNumber),
        /* null state */
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_emptyState(
          cardType: "ins_NoRelatedProcurementsAvailable",
          i18nData: ri!i18nData
        ),
        /* means this record was created from solicitation in AM */
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_relatedProcurementDetailsForEvalSummary(
          solicitationDetails: local!getSolicDetailsFromAm,
          bundle: ri!i18nData
        )
      ),
      hideCard: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!solicitationNumber),
      sectionMarginAbove: "STANDARD",
      cardShape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
      cardPadding: "STANDARD",
      showCardBorder: false,
      showCardShadow: true
    )
  ),
  whenTrue: or(
    rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_APPVERSION_UT_VersionTrackerWrapper_exists(),
    rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_AM_APPVERSION_UT_VersionTrackerWrapper_exists()
  ),
  then: rule!AS_GSS_SCT_evaluationSummarySectionField(
    label: "Solicitation",
    contents: rule!AS_GSS_CRD_emptyState(
      cardType: "ins_NoRelatedProcurementsAvailable",
      i18nData: ri!i18nData
    ),
    sectionMarginAbove: "STANDARD",
    cardShape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
    cardPadding: "STANDARD",
    showCardBorder: false,
    showCardShadow: true
  ),
  default: {}
)

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextListWithShowMoreLess
interfaces.description: Generic interface for displaying rich text display components fields

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!itemsToDisplay: a!refreshVariable(
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!items,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount),
        ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: rule!AS_GSS_UT_showMoreOrShowLessList(
        item: ri!items,
        shortenIfLongerThanCount: ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount,
        includeLineBreak: if(
          ri!showBulletedList,
          ri!includeLineBreak,
          false
        ),
        i18nData: ri!i18nData
      )
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: if(
      ri!showBulletedList,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextBulletedList"(items: local!itemsToDisplay),
      local!itemsToDisplay
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
    accessibilityText: if(
      count(ri!items) > ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount,
      "Clicking more will add additional content behind your current location",
      null
    )
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
interfaces.description: Generic interface for displaying rich text fields

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!choiceValues,
    expression: a!localVariables(
      local!isSelected: rule!AS_CO_UT_compare(
        value1: ri!value,
        value2: ri!choiceValues[fv!index]
      ),
      local!hasLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt: ri!choiceLabels, field: fv!index)),
      local!itemIcon: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt:ri!choiceIcons, field: fv!index),
      local!itemLink: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt:ri!choiceLinks, field: fv!index),
      local!iconToShow: if(
        local!isSelected,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
          nullableValue: ri!selectedIcon,
          replacementValue: local!itemIcon
        ),
        local!itemIcon
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
        contents: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: local!iconToShow, size: "MEDIUM"),
                  " "
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!iconToShow)
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: ri!choiceLabels[fv!index],
                size: "MEDIUM",
                showWhen: local!hasLabel,
                color: if(ri!isChecklistStatus, "ACCENT", {})
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: " (" & ri!itemCount[fv!index] & ")",
                size: "MEDIUM",
                color: if(ri!isChecklistStatus, "ACCENT", {}),
                showWhen: ri!showItemCount
              )
            }
          )
        },
        link: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!itemLink),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
            value: ri!choiceValues[fv!index],
            saveInto: ri!saveInto,
            showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!disabled)
          ),
          local!itemLink
        ),
        accessibilityText: if(
          local!isSelected,
          "Selected",
          ""
        ),
        style: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_not(local!isSelected),
          "NONE",
          ri!disabled,
          "STANDARD",
          "ACCENT"
        ),
        showBorder: false
      )
    )
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!expandFactor: false,
  local!selectedFactor: null,
  local!selectedSubfactor: null,
  local!selectedFactorIndex,
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!selectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: { local!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!factorTasksTriggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!updatedEvaluationRecord: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvaluationRecordWithAllVendors(
    evaluation: ri!evaluationRecord,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
    executeWhen: true()
  ),
  local!allFactorsRecords: rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructAllFactorAssignmentInformation(
    evaluationId: local!updatedEvaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    triggerRefresh: local!factorTasksTriggerRefresh,
    returnFlat: true(),
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.CriteriaAssignment,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.EvaluatorTeam,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.Rating
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationFactorsRecords: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
    records: local!allFactorsRecords,
    field: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.parentCriteriaId,
    values: { null }
  ),
  local!evaluationSubFactorsRecords: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
    records: local!allFactorsRecords,
    field: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.parentCriteriaId,
    values: local!evaluationFactorsRecords[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId]
  ),
  local!evaluationTeamsRecords: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluatorTeam(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: local!updatedEvaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    fields: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.teamMembership
  ),
  local!missingItems: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateMissingInfoWithRelatedActions(
      missingInfo: rule!AS_GSS_BL_validateMissingInformation(
        evaluation: local!updatedEvaluationRecord,
        evaluationFactors: local!evaluationFactorsRecords,
        evaluationSubfactors: local!evaluationSubFactorsRecords,
        evaluatorTeams: local!evaluationTeamsRecords,
        i18nData: local!i18nData
      ),
      display: "LABEL_AND_ICON",
      style: "LINKS",
      align: "END"
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: true
  ),
  local!showDetails: false,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headerContentLayout"(
    backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
      brandingKey: "DefaultBackground",
      useSuiteBranding: true
    ),
    contentsPadding: "NONE",
    contents: {
      /*Missing Info validation banner*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_missingInfoForSetupEvaluation(
        missingItems: local!missingItems,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        showDetails: local!showDetails,
        showWhen: and(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
            user: ri!loggedInUser,
            groups: {
              cons!AS_GSS_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
              cons!AS_GSS_GRP_EVALUATION_CHAIRS
            }
          ),
          local!updatedEvaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId] = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!missingItems)
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
        columns: {
          /*left panel*/
          rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationInformationForLeftPanelOfSummary(
            i18nData: local!i18nData,
            expandFactor: local!expandFactor,
            selectedFactor: local!selectedFactor,
            selectedSubfactor: local!selectedSubfactor,
            selectedFactorIndex: local!selectedFactorIndex,
            triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
            factorTasksTriggerRefresh: local!factorTasksTriggerRefresh,
            evaluationFactors: local!evaluationFactorsRecords,
            loggedInUser: ri!loggedInUser,
            allFactors: local!allFactorsRecords,
            evaluationRecord: local!updatedEvaluationRecord,
            selectedTasks: local!selectedTasks,
            isHomePage: false(),
            isEvaluator: rule!AS_GSS_BL_determineIfUserIsEvaluator(loggedInUser: ri!loggedInUser),
            isStateOrLocal: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper()
          ),
          /*right panel*/
          rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationInformationForRightPanelOfSummary(
            i18nData: local!i18nData,
            loggedInUser: ri!loggedInUser,
            evaluationRecord: local!updatedEvaluationRecord,
            allFactorsRecord: local!allFactorsRecords,
            evaluationFactorsRecord: local!evaluationFactorsRecords,
            triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
          )
        }
      )
    }
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!refData: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes(refTypes: null),
  local!stateRefData: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefState(filters: null),
  local!countryRefData: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefCountry(filters: null),
  local!refRatingData: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefRatings(parentRatingId: null),
  local!userDetails: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getUser(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!evaluatorNickNames: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getMaskEvaluatorDetails(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: ri!selectedEvaluation.evaluationId,

  ),
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
      label :"Evaluation History",
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      rowHeader: 1,
      data: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationAudits(
        evaluationId: ri!selectedEvaluation.evaluationId,
        returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
        pagingInfo: fv!pagingInfo
      ),
      columns: {
        /*User name*/
        {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "User",
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
              images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userImage"(
                user: fv!row["username"],
                altText: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(user: fv!row["username"]),

              ),
              size: "SMALL",
              style: "AVATAR",
              align: "CENTER",
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED"
            ),
            align: "CENTER",
            width: "NARROW"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            value: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(user: fv!row["username"]),
            sortField: null
          )
        },
        /*Modification*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Modification",
          align: "",
          value: rule!AS_GSS_DSP_modificationCommentForEvaluationAudit(
            evaluationAuditEntry: fv!row,
            evaluation: ri!selectedEvaluation,
            refData: local!refData,
            stateRefData: local!stateRefData,
            countryRefData: local!countryRefData,
            refRatingData: local!refRatingData,
            evaluationVendors: ri!evaluationVendors,
            evaluationPhases: ri!evaluationPhases,
            evaluationCriterias: ri!evaluationCriterias,
            evaluatorTeams: ri!evaluatorTeams,
            userDetails: local!userDetails,
            i18nData: local!i18nData,
            evaluationDocs: ri!evaluationDocs,
            evaluatorNickNames: local!evaluatorNickNames
          ),
          width: "WIDE"
        ),
        /*Time*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: "Time",
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(datetime: fv!row.timestamp),
          sortField: "timestamp",
          align: "END",
          width: "NARROW_PLUS"
        )
      },
      borderStyle: "LIGHT",
      shadeAlternateRows: true,
      pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,
      initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "timestamp", ascending: false),
      secondarySorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: "evaluationAuditId",
        ascending: false
      ),
      emptyGridMessage: "No history available"
    )
  }
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isExpanded: true(),
  {
    rule!AS_GSS_CPS_consensusReportDetailsPerFactor(
      factor: ri!factor,
      bundle: ri!bundle,
      isSubfactor: false(),
      isExpanded: true(),
      selectedFactor: ri!selectedFactor,
      selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
      isFirstSubFactor: null,
      loggedInUser: ri!loggedInUser,
      allFactors: ri!allFactors,
      evaluationRecord: ri!evaluationRecord,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
      spacing: "NONE",
      columns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
          width: "EXTRA_NARROW",
          contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
                icon: if(
                  local!isExpanded,
                  "angle-down",
                  "angle-right"
                ),
                altText: if(local!isExpanded, "Expanded", ""),
                link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                  value: not(local!isExpanded),
                  saveInto: local!isExpanded
                ),
                linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
                size: "MEDIUM"
              ),
              " "
            },
            align: "RIGHT"
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
          contents: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!factor[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.SubCriteria],
              expression: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_consensusReportDetailsPerFactor(
                factor: fv!item,
                bundle: ri!bundle,
                isSubfactor: true(),
                isExpanded: local!isExpanded,
                selectedFactor: ri!selectedFactor,
                selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
                isFirstSubFactor: fv!isFirst,
                loggedInUser: ri!loggedInUser,
                allFactors: ri!allFactors,
                evaluationRecord: ri!evaluationRecord,
                subFactorCount: fv!itemCount,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
              )
            )
          }
        )
      },
      showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
        value: index(
          ri!factor,
          recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.SubCriteria.criteriaId,
          null
        )
      )
    )
  }
)

rule!AS_GSS_CPS_viewFactors(
  evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
  loggedInUser: loggedInUser()
)

rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationRatingsTab(
  evaluationId:rv!identifier ,
  evaluationFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "is null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationSubFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "not null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  )
)

    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),

)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_updateEvaluationRecordWithRelatedInfo
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to update evaluation record with related information based on passed in inputs

data.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
  ),
  {},
  a!localVariables(
    local!evalTaskInfo: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvaluationRecordWithAllTasks(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      additionalFilters: ri!taskRecordAdditionalFilters,
      taskFields: ri!taskRecordFields,
      executeWhen: ri!isTaskInfoRequired
    ),
    local!evalVendorInfo: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvaluationRecordWithAllVendors(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      vendorFields: ri!vendorRecordFields,
      executeWhen: ri!isVendorInfoRequired
    ),
    local!evalFactorInfo: if(
      ri!isFactorInfoRequired,
      rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructAllFactorAssignmentInformation(
        evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        returnFlat: ri!returnFlatFactors,
        fields: ri!factorRecordFields
      ),
      {}
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      typeOf: ri!evaluation,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: ri!evaluation,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.task: local!evalTaskInfo[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.task],
          recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.vendor: local!evalVendorInfo[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.vendor],
          recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.criteria: local!evalFactorInfo
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
  ),
  {},
  a!localVariables(
    local!evalTaskInfo: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvaluationRecordWithAllTasks(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      additionalFilters: ri!taskRecordAdditionalFilters,
      taskFields: ri!taskRecordFields,
      executeWhen: ri!isTaskInfoRequired
    ),
    local!evalVendorInfo: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvaluationRecordWithAllVendors(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      vendorFields: ri!vendorRecordFields,
      executeWhen: ri!isVendorInfoRequired
    ),
    local!evalFactorInfo: if(
      ri!isFactorInfoRequired,
      rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructAllFactorAssignmentInformation(
        evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        returnFlat: ri!returnFlatFactors,
        fields: ri!factorRecordFields
      ),
      {}
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      typeOf: ri!evaluation,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: ri!evaluation,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.task: local!evalTaskInfo[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.task],

  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD,

)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_I18N_UT_displayLabel_RichText
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data plus arguments with rich text configurations

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!label: ri!i18nData[ri!bundleKey],
  local!updatedLabel: a!defaultValue(local!label, ri!bundleKey),
  local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!richTextArguments),
    local!updatedLabel,
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_I18N_UT_replaceArgument_RichText(
        richTextItems: _,
        index: _,
        richTextArguments: ri!richTextArguments
      ),
      { local!updatedLabel },
      enumerate(count(ri!richTextArguments)) + 1
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!updatedLabelForArguments,
    expression: if(
      typeof(fv!item) = 'type!{urn:com:appian:typesAS:GSS}AS_GSS_RichTextArgument',
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: fv!item.argument,
        style: fv!item.style,
        size: fv!item.size,
        color: fv!item.color,
        link: fv!item.link,
        linkStyle: fv!item.linkStyle
      ),
      fv!item
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!label: ri!i18nData[ri!bundleKey],
  local!updatedLabel: a!defaultValue(local!label, ri!bundleKey),
  local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!richTextArguments),
    local!updatedLabel,
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_I18N_UT_replaceArgument_RichText(
        richTextItems: _,
        index: _,
        richTextArguments: ri!richTextArguments
      ),
      { local!updatedLabel },
      enumerate(count(ri!richTextArguments)) + 1
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!updatedLabelForArguments,
    expression: if(
      typeof(fv!item) = 'type!{urn:com:appian:typesAS:GSS}AS_GSS_RichTextArgument',
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: fv!item.argument,
        style: fv!item.style,
        size: fv!item.size,
        color: fv!item.color,
        link: fv!item.link,
        linkStyle: fv!item.linkStyle
      ),
      fv!item
    )
  )
)

  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dataSubset"(),
  /*The logic to construct the vendor information in batches*/
  todatasubset(
    arrayToPage: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.vendor],
      expression: a!map(
        evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
        vendorName: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
        cageCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode],
        uei: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId],
        tin: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin],
        fein: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein],
        vendorId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
        isActiveInSAM: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
        submissionDate: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate],
        numOfDocuments: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorDocCount],
        isUpdateRequired: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isUpdateRequired],
        pendingUpdateCount: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pendingUpdateCount],
        taskProgress: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_UT_calculateTaskPercentCompletion(
          taskDictionary: a!map(
            totalRequiredTasks: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalTaskCount],
            totalCompletedTasks: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.completedTaskCount]
          )
        ),
        totalPrice: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalPrice],
        decisionTypeId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.decisionTypeId]
      )

      startIndex: ri!pagingInfo.startIndex,
      batchSize: ri!pagingInfo.batchSize,
      sort: ri!pagingInfo.sort

  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue

  ri!value,

  ri!inArray,

  ri!replacement,

  if(

    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],

    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],

    ri!customDefault
  )
)
data.definition:

  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Datetime',
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!date),
    null,

    userdatetime(
      year(ri!date),
      month(ri!date),
      day(ri!date),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userHour, replacementValue: 0),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userMinute, replacementValue: 0),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userSecond, replacementValue: 0)
    )
  )
)
data.definition:

      month(ri!date),
      day(ri!date),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userHour, replacementValue: 0),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userMinute, replacementValue: 0),

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATOR_TEAM,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters.value,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!teamId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "teamId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!teamId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive=true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName
expression_rules.description: Rule to extract document name and extension from files uploaded

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_formatDocumentSingleClickDownloadLink
expression_rules.description: rule to give the url to be called as safe link to achieve single click download of a document from external source

data.sail_code:
if(
  or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!source),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!appianDocId)
  ),
  null,
  concat(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl(),
    "webapi/fetchDocumentFromExtSource?source=",
    externalize(ri!source),
    "&appianDocId=",
    externalize(ri!appianDocId)
  )
)
data.definition:
if(
  or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!source),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!appianDocId)
  ),
  null,
  concat(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl(),
    "webapi/fetchDocumentFromExtSource?source=",
    externalize(ri!source),
    "&appianDocId=",
    externalize(ri!appianDocId)
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
expression_rules.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(

    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),

    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),

    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
  
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    
    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),
    
    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfAnyWeightIsNullAndMismatchedTotalWeight
expression_rules.description: Returns true if either any of the weights is null or total weight doesn't match the upper limit.

inputs.name: parentFactorWeight
inputs.description:
If a value is passed, checks whether total sum of subfactors weights matches its parent factor weight.
If a value is NOT passed, checks whether total sum of parent factors weights matches 100.

test_cases.test_name: Parent Factor - When total weight is 100, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight doesn't match factor weight and no weights are null or 0
Parent Factor - When total weight doesn't match 100 and no weights are null or 0

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_userLinkDisplay
expression_rules.description: Displays a read-only link to a user page with customize-able label and label position

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!username),
    ri!valueIfNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser(groupOrUser: ri!username)
  ),
  linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
  link: if(
    and(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!username),
      isusernametaken(ri!username)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"(
      label: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser(groupOrUser: ri!username),
      user: touser(ri!username)
    ),
    null
  )
)
data.definition:

  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase',

  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters.value,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationPhaseId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),

      value: ri!evaluationPhaseId
    ),

      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId

      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive=true)
    ),

  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_constructEvaluationDurationForSummaryPage
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to construct the evaluation duration to be displayed in the summary page

data.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: {
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!endDate),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!startDate)
  },
  equals: { true, true },
  then: " - ",
  equals: { false, true },
  then: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!i18nData,
    bundleKey: "txt_EvaluationEnding",
    arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(ri!endDate)
  ),
  equals: { true, false },
  then: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!i18nData,
    bundleKey: "txt_EvaluationStarting",
    arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(ri!startDate)
  ),
  equals: { false, false },
  then: concat(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(date: ri!startDate),
    " - ",
    rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(date: ri!endDate)
  ),
  default: {}
)
data.definition:
a!match(
  value: {
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!endDate),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!startDate)
  },
  equals: { true, true },
  then: " - ",
  equals: { false, true },
  then: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!i18nData,
    bundleKey: "txt_EvaluationEnding",
    arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(ri!endDate)
  ),
  equals: { true, false },
  then: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!i18nData,
    bundleKey: "txt_EvaluationStarting",
    arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(ri!startDate)
  ),
  equals: { false, false },
  then: concat(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(date: ri!startDate),
    " - ",
    rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(date: ri!endDate)
  ),
  default: {}
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_filterRecords
expression_rules.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),

    )
  ),

    )
  ),

    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),

  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",

    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",

    )
  ),
  local!output

inputs.name: records
inputs.description: A list of record objects to filter.

inputs.name: field
inputs.description: Either a single field or multiple fields to filter against. If a single field is passed, the "value" parameter can be a list where any choice is considered a match. If multiple fields are passed, the "value" parameter should be the same length, and each value would be used for the corresponding field at the same position in the input array.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: Either a single value or list of values to filter against. See the "field" parameter for more information on how to properly use this input.

inputs.name: fieldValuePairs
inputs.description: A map array of field-value pairs to use for filtering. Note, this parameter should only be used in place of the "field" and "value" parameters (only pass this if those are both empty). This allows for more complicated filtering against multiple fields and multiple values of varying array lengths. For example, {a!map(field: Case.fields.status, value: "Open"), a!map(field: Case.fields.priority, value: {"High", "Medium"})}.

inputs.name: filterType
inputs.description: Determines the filter result of the records. Valid values: "FILTER" (default), "REJECT", "FIRST_MATCH", "FIRST_REJECT", "MATCH_COUNT", "REJECT_COUNT", "MATCH_INDICES", "REJECT_INDICES", "FULL_RESULT".

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the provided factors weights sum to the provided weight, or the default of 100, with some leniency to account for summing fractions

data.sail_code:
/*
Note:
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total
subfactor weight to x.
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

inputs.name: parentFactorWeight
inputs.description:
If a value is passed, checks whether total sum of subfactors weights matches its parent factor weight.
If a value is NOT passed, checks whether total sum of parent factors weights matches 100.

test_cases.test_name: Parent Factor - When total weight is 100, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight and no weights are null or 0
Parent Factor - When total weight is 100 and no weights are null or 0

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

data.sail_code:
/*Note: This rule cannot have assertions*/
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CONSENSUS_REPORT,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Report',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!consensusId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!factorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!vendorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!status),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationid)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "consensusId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!consensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "consensusId",
      operator: "not in",
      value: ri!excludeConsensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factorId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!factorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "status.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!status
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isArchived",
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!isArchived,
        default: {false}
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead

data.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set.

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/
data.definition:

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

*/

  /*Determine the castResultToType*/

  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(

      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(

)/*

expression_rules.description: Expression to extract document name based on Id

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!rawDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!documetId),
    "",
    getcontentobjectdetailsbyid(ri!documetId)
  ),
  local!wholeName: index(
    extract(local!rawDetails, "[Name: ", ", UUID:"),
    1,
    null()
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName(docName: local!wholeName)
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields
expression_rules.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by multiple fields and values for those fields (acts as an AND filter)

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  reduce(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler(
      previousIndices: _,
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: _,
      value: _
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_enumForCount(ri!cdt),
    merge(
      a!flatten(ri!fields),
      a!flatten(ri!values)
    )
  )
)
data.definition:

   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',

    rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler(

      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: _,
      value: _
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_enumForCount(ri!cdt),
    merge(
      a!flatten(ri!fields),
      a!flatten(ri!values)
    )
  )
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_USER,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_User',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        operator: "AND",
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!isActive,
            applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!isActive)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "username",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!usernames
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!logicalExpression
    }
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "firstName", ascending: true)
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_USER,

)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UI_createDocumentIcon
expression_rules.description: Returns a rich text icon for a document

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fileExtension: tostring(index(split(ri!extension, "."), count(split(ri!extension, ".")), null)),

  local!isExcel: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"xls", "csv"}),

  local!isWord: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"doc"}),

  local!isPowerpoint: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"ppt"}),

  local!isPdf: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"pdf"}),

  local!isZip: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"zip", "rar", "rar4"}),

  local!isImage: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"jpg", "jpeg", "png", "gif"}),

  local!isCode: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"xml", "html", "java", "xsd", "sql", "css", "js"}),

  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
    icon: if(
      local!isExcel,
      "file-excel-o",
      local!isWord,
      "file-word-o",
      local!isPowerpoint,
      "file-powerpoint-o",
      local!isPdf,
      "file-pdf-o",
      local!isZip,
      "file-zip-o",
      local!isImage,
      "file-picture-o",
      local!isCode,
      "file-code-o",
      "file-text-o"
    ),
    color: ri!color,
    size: ri!size,
    link: ri!link,
    linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
    caption: ri!caption,
    altText: ri!altText
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fileExtension: tostring(index(split(ri!extension, "."), count(split(ri!extension, ".")), null)),

  local!isExcel: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"xls", "csv"}),

  local!isWord: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"doc"}),

  local!isPowerpoint: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"ppt"}),

  local!isPdf: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"pdf"}),

  local!isZip: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"zip", "rar", "rar4"}),

  local!isImage: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"jpg", "jpeg", "png", "gif"}),

  local!isCode: any(search(_, local!fileExtension), {"xml", "html", "java", "xsd", "sql", "css", "js"}),

  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
    icon: if(
      local!isExcel,
      "file-excel-o",
      local!isWord,
      "file-word-o",
      local!isPowerpoint,
      "file-powerpoint-o",
      local!isPdf,
      "file-pdf-o",
      local!isZip,
      "file-zip-o",
      local!isImage,
      "file-picture-o",
      local!isCode,
      "file-code-o",
      "file-text-o"
    ),
    color: ri!color,
    size: ri!size,

    caption: ri!caption,
    altText: ri!altText
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationByIdentifier
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation synced record based on the provided evaluation ids.

data.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(value: ri!evaluationId),
  recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(),
  rule!AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier(
    recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
    identifier: ri!evaluationId,
    executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    fields: ri!fields,
    relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
  )
)

    taskName: ri!tasks.taskName,
    taskDesc: ri!tasks.taskDesc,
    taskBehaviorType: ri!tasks.taskBehaviorType,
    taskCategory: ri!tasks.taskCategory,
    taskChecklist: ri!tasks.taskChecklist,
    groupAssignee: ri!tasks.groupAssignee,
    userAssignee: ri!tasks.userAssignee,
    docUploadContext: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!tasks.docUploadContext),
      null,
      /*we will retain the complete docuUploadContext along with office365Details only for 'Review Document' tasks. For doc with template tasks, office365 details will not be retained*/
      and(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!tasks.reviewDocumentId),
        ri!tasks.taskRefId = cons!AS_GSS_TMG_TASK_REF_ID_REVIEW_DOCUMENT
      ),
      ri!tasks.docUploadContext,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task_DocUploadContext',
        value: {
          taskDocUploadContextId: ri!tasks.docUploadContext.taskDocUploadContextId,
          docExtension: ri!tasks.docUploadContext.docExtension,
          docTypeId: ri!tasks.docUploadContext.docTypeId,
          docTemplate: ri!tasks.docUploadContext.docTemplate
        }
      )
    ),
    review: ri!tasks.review,
    reviewCommentId: ri!tasks.reviewCommentId,
    reviewDocumentId: ri!tasks.reviewDocumentId,
    availableDatetime: ri!tasks.availableDatetime,
    dueDate: rule!AS_GSS_BL_getDueDateOnRegeneratingItem(tasks: ri!tasks),
    duration: ri!tasks.duration,
    durationUnit: ri!tasks.durationUnit,
    noOfDaysFromStart: ri!tasks.noOfDaysFromStart,
    vendor:ri!tasks.vendor,
    criteria:ri!tasks.criteria
  }
)
data.definition:

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getExternalVendorUpdates
expression_rules.description: Returns  vendor action details from AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD.externalVendorId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!externalVendorIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD.proposalActionId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!proposalActionId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true(),
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorUpdates_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

constants.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_CHIEF_VISIBILITY

Toggles whether or not evaluations have an evaluation chief.  Evaluation chiefs have contracting team level access in many parts of the application, so if you do not want any evaluators with elevated access, then this should be set to FALSE.

NOTE: If this toggle is set to FALSE in your environment, you will not want to place any users in the Evaluation Chairs group, as this groups also has contracting personnel level access and based on this toggle it will add/remove the Evaluation Chair group in the daily nightly process.
